name: Pawmot
flavorText: This Pokémon normally is slow to react, but once it enters battle, it will strike down its enemies with lightning-fast movements.

previous.name: Pawmo
previous.flavorText: When its group is attacked, Pawmo is the first to leap into battle, defeating enemies with a fighting technique that utilizes electric shocks.

next.name: Tandemaus
next.flavorText: Exhibiting great teamwork, they use their incisors to cut pieces out of any material that might be useful for a nest, then make off with them.

pokemon.name: Pawmi
pokemon.flavorText: It has underdeveloped electric sacs on its cheeks. These sacs can produce electricity only if Pawmi rubs them furiously with the pads on its forepaws.
